name: elixir
title: Elixir
description: Navigate Elixir's documentation without leaving Raycast.
author: dinocosta

commands.name: search-modules
commands.title: Search Modules
commands.description: Find and reference function documentation by moule in Elixir's standard library.

commands.name: search-functions
commands.title: Search Functions
commands.description: Find and reference function documentation in Elixir's standard library.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
